mapper.select: select count(board_no) from board where board_cate like #{boardCate} || '%'

select file_no, file_savepath, file_name, file_orgname, file_size, file_mime, file_downcount, file_regdate, file_uploader, file_del_conf, file_del_date, file_code from attach where file_no = #{fileNo}
mapper.update: update attach set file_downcount = file_downcount+1 where file_no = #{fileNo}
update attach set FILE_DEL_CONF = 'Y', FILE_DEL_DATE = sysdate where file_code = 'a' || #{fileCode}
update board set board_cate = #{boardCate}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_cont = #{boardCont}, board_upddate = sysdate where board_no = #{boardNo}
